paper.title: Hypergraph Transversal Computation with Binary Decision Diagrams
paper.venue: Symposium on Experimental and Efficient Algorithms
paper.abstract: We study a hypergraph transversal computation: given a hypergraph, the problem is to generate all minimal transversals. This problem is related to many applications in computer science and various algorithms have been proposed. We present a new efficient algorithm using the compressed data structures BDDs and ZDDs, and we analyze the time complexity for it. By conducting computational experiments, we show that our algorithm is highly competitive with existing algorithms.
